description: Human activity recognition from smartphone sensors. 30 subjects performing 6 activities with waist-mounted Samsung Galaxy S II. Triaxial accelerometer and gyroscope at 50Hz.

channels.name: body_acc_x
channels.description: Body acceleration X-axis from accelerometer (gravity removed)

channels.name: body_acc_y
channels.description: Body acceleration Y-axis from accelerometer (gravity removed)

channels.name: body_acc_z
channels.description: Body acceleration Z-axis from accelerometer (gravity removed)

channels.name: total_acc_x
channels.description: Total acceleration X-axis from accelerometer (includes gravity)

channels.name: total_acc_y
channels.description: Total acceleration Y-axis from accelerometer (includes gravity)

channels.name: total_acc_z
channels.description: Total acceleration Z-axis from accelerometer (includes gravity)
